Wings: A full pound of hand breaded chicken wings served with korean bbq, buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq or spicy honey garlic sauce or try the Pemi Favorite - buffalo and dry rub together!
Chicken Tenders: tempura chicken tenders with buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq, korean bbq, or spicy honey garlic
Fried Pickles: sour and crispy, served with buttermilk ranch
Irish Nachos: house fried potato chips, cheddar, bacon, fresh scallions, jalapenos, sour cream
GoGo Bites: deep fried bites filled with jalapenos, roasted corn, bacon & cream cheese, deep fried and served with BBQ drizzle
Pemi Dip: creamy bacon dip w/ a 3 cheese blend, whole grain mustard, caramelized onion and scallions served w/warm soft pretzel bites
Sweet & Spicy Falafel: falafel tossed in buffalo sauce with sweet & sour yogurt, tomato jam and pickled celery

New England Clam Chowder: homemade with celery, onions, potatoes, cream and LOTS of clams!
Summer Salad: baby arugula, strawberries & pickled red onion, tossed in a citrus vinaigrette w/ goat cheese & toasted almonds
Mediterranean Caprese: white bean & cracked wheat salad tossed in blood orange vinegarette with charred tomatoes, marinated olives, feta & fresh mozzarella. Finished with balsamic reduction & micro herbs
Asian Salad: shredded lettuce, pea shoots & mixed vegetables tossed in a sesame soy vinaigrette. Topped with crispy wontons and toasted sesame seeds

subtitle: substitute a gluten free crust for $2

Public House: mozzarella, pesto, feta, sliced tomatoes, roasted garlic
BLT Flatbread: pemi dip base, bacon, tomatoes, mixed greens, cheddar, mozzarella, spicy mayo drizzle
BBQ Chicken: ranch, shredded chicken, mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, bbq, onions

subtitle: Served with hand cut fries and pickle.  Substitute truffle fries for $2. Add a cup of chowder to any Sandwich for $6. Substitute a gluten free roll to any sandwich for $2

Chicken Sandwich: grilled chicken w/ cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato & onion, garlic aioli. Served on a brioche roll
Lulu's Big Dog: ¼ lb all beef hotdog with grilled peppers, pickled onion & whole grain mustard
Pemi Sliders*: 2 angus beef patties topped with cheddar, bacon, garlic aioli, lettuce & tomato, on grilled brioche.
Banh Mi: smoked pork, carrot, pickled cucumbers, jalapenos & fresh cilantro with spicy mayo, served on toasted french roll
Falafel Sandwich: with herbed yogurt, cucumber salad, feta & pea shoots.  Served on a brioche roll
Quinoa Burger: red quinoa, lentil & roasted garlic “burger” with pickled red onion, sharp cheddar, tomato jam, mixed greens & garlic aioli. Served on a brioche roll
Impossible Burger: plant protein based burger served on grilled brioche with lettuce, onion, and tomato

subtitle: Add cup oof chowder to any meal for $6

Steak & Cheese Eggrolls: lean grilled beef with a 3 cheese blend & sweet onions fried to a golden brown. Served with a roasted pepper salad & spicy pub dipping sauce
Asian Chicken: marinated sesame ginger chicken with stir fried mixed vegetables. Served over Thai fried rice with ginger jus & crispy wontons
Grilled Chicken: marinated grilled chicken & roasted asparagus. Served over sliced tomatoes
Street Corn Shrimp: marinated grilled shrimp served over a cheesy street corn topped with pico de gallo, grilled peppers, pickled red onions, smashed avocado, cotija cheese and fresh cilantro
Try it with grilled chicken instead of shrimp
Naan Tacos: adobo pulled chicken, cotija cheese, grilled peppers & onions, corn salsa, micro cilantro, lime sour cream on mini naan
